personal_info.summary: Systems Engineer with solid experience in Full Stack software development, with knowledge in testing and Cl/CD, API creation and REST API with NodeJS, knowledge in NestJS and NextJS. I am a very communicative person, with the ability to transform technical language into practical and understandable examples as needed. I am also proactive, professional and always looking for improvement.

responsibilities: Developed features and bug fixes in a multilayered solution, where the backend was a multi-layer solution, with a microservices architecture, and a robust database, I contributed by creating new REST services, from the development of queries and stored procedures to their exposure through controllers.

On the front-end I was responsible for integrating and correcting the integration of several new and existing services, where I took great care of the end-user experience and had great handling of edge case scenarios.
Successfully managed the migration of projects from .NET Framework to .NET 8, solving configuration problems and fixing errors during the transition.
Collaborated with remote US team with all SCRUM traditional meetings.
